description: Returns, adds, and edits collections of clusters and users in MongoDB Cloud.

Profile.description: The profile is defined in AWS Secret manager. See [Secret Manager Profile setup](../../../examples/profile-secret.yaml).

CreatedAt.description: Date and time when MongoDB Cloud sent the invitation. This parameter expresses its value in ISO 8601 format in UTC.

ExpiresAt.description: Date and time when MongoDB Cloud expires the invitation. This parameter expresses its value in ISO 8601 format in UTC.

ProjectId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the invitation.

TotalCount.description: Number of documents returned in this response.

PageNum.description: Number of the page that displays the current set of the total objects that the response returns.

InvitationId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the invitation.

InviterUsername.description: Email address of the MongoDB Cloud user who sent the invitation.

Roles.description: One or more organization or project level roles to assign to the MongoDB Cloud user.

Username.description: Email address of the user account invited to this project.
